title: For those who didn't see in Red Tracker

embed.description: See questions and answers from Scott Hawkes (@RiotJaredan)

body:
Here's Jarodon's brand newerino Ask.fm. Das gr8, now we can get somewhat consistent lore answers.

Send it to all lore enthousiast friends :D

replies.body: Neat.
(upvote for firstu pageuh)

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wNl1iqX3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-04-22T13:52:03.725+0000)
>
> (upvote for firstu pageuh)

Huh?
Let's give visibility.

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wNl1iqX3,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-22T14:40:18.139+0000)
>
> Let's give visibility.

You want visibility?  Let me help a tiny bit.  

(Also, good luck, Jaredan!  Hope it's a great medium for player communication! :D)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
omg hai Bio
Best of luck, Jaredan.  Try not to get buried in people hollering about balance issues to every single Rioter.
Oh god, I didn't even think of that. Or even "OMG i GOT BANNED FUK U RITO GET CONSER"
LET THE QUESTION FLOOD BEGIN. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
poor guy (deserved :3)

He answered my question. Apparently it was the first.

Igotlazy: Are there any plans to potentially have a weekly updated League of Legends Webcomic? Something like The Dawngate Chronicles.

Jaredan: We certainly plan to have regularly released storytelling, including through the medium of comics. It may not be in the same format that you mention, but we want to provide great episodic story content (as well as cool one-off stories).
Woohoo! First question answered!
Welp, got my question in.  300 symbols seems a bit limiting, I guess I'm just always a wordy bugger.
Put it here. I will shorten it.
I asked him if he liked working for rito and he never responded qq

> [{quoted}](name=PDE5 Inhib,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wNl1iqX3,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-04-22T23:51:04.270+0000)
>
> I asked him if he liked working for rito and he never responded qq

He said I dont like it. I LOVE IT.
I see that now lol
Time to interrogate him about more Wukong lore :p

He started answering bois.
Hope he gets to my koggles question before I fall asleep.
Has he answered anyone yet? I don't know how ask.fm operates but would love to read.
jorodin teasing us TwT
Nope.
